title: Is Graham Mcneill the guy who writes all the stories?
body: Cause if he is, I wanna give him a hug

replies.body: We have a team of dedicated writers and editors in the Narrative Discipline, not just me, but I'll take a hug any day of the week!

> [{quoted}](name=Dinopawz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cRUtnwle,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-08T01:52:12.240+0000)
>
> We have a team of dedicated writers and editors in the Narrative Discipline, not just me, but I'll take a hug any day of the week!

Did you write Jayce/Viktor bio ? I mean you got experience from writing about "brothers" whose goals kinda differs and having to fight {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

( BTW : Fulgrim is one of my fav' books of all times, really glad to see you on the team, and really looking forward to those amazing stories  o/ )

> [{quoted}](name=Dinopawz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cRUtnwle,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-08T01:52:12.240+0000)
>
> We have a team of dedicated writers and editors in the Narrative Discipline, not just me, but I'll take a hug any day of the week!

I love ya man
I'm reading the Priests of Mars Trilogy right now
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Yeah but you wrote Burning Tides. That makes you the writer I actually like. Good work.
He doesn't write all of them. There are several writers.
